title: How many of her own songs does Beyoncé write? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not exactly sure, but I believe she writes or co-writes the vast majority of her own Songs. Notable exceptions include “If I Were a Boy” (from Sasha Fierce) and “Kitty Kat” (from B’Day). Also, I’m assuming that (of the Songs that she do write) she only writes the lyrics and vocal melodies for those songs, as I haven't heard or seen anything about her “making beats” (Hip-Hop/Pop music term for somebody who puts instrumentals together) or play any instruments, in spite of her also being credited as a “record producer” (meaning supervisor over the sound recording) on the majority of her projects.

I was going to do a whole list of who does what but it's a clear a mud, so instead I thought I would attach some links for you. Here are two sides of the Beyoncé coin: Does Beyoncé Write Her Own Music? And Does It Really Matter? Here’s Why Criticizing Beyoncé for Working with Songwriters Is Ignorant
